transcript:
Customer: Hello
Helllo
Executive: Hanji sir.
Customer: Leo Motors se baat ho rahi hai sir.
Namaskar sir Sudha
Ji
Hello Vishal Vishal ji baat kar rahe hai na sir.
Sir Leo Motors se baat ho rahi hai.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Namaskar sir Sudhanshu baat kar raha hu India Mart se kaise ho aap.
Executive: Badhiya sir.
Customer: Aapki service live hui hai sir India Mart pe.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Usi ke regarding discussion karna tha aur morning me call bhi aaya tha mafi chahta hu uske liye mai ek meeting me busy hone ki vajah se aapka call receive nahi kar paya tha sir.
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir.
Customer: Bataye sir services use karne ke liye guide karna tha aapne pehle call ka purpose bataye call aapka kyu aaya tha matlab kis liye call kiye the aap.
Executive: Sir maine call kiya tha wo jo
meri jo GST me wo tha na nature of business.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Wo maine jo hai change karwa diya tha manufacturer ho gaya tha wo mere me service provider and other aa raha hai.
Customer: Ek minute aap aapka GST change ho gaya hai.
Executive: Hanji ho gaya hai sir.
Customer: To aapke pass three page ka PDF hoga na.
Executive: Kiska?
Customer: Three page ka jo GST ka PDF hoga.
Executive: GST ka PDF ha.
Customer: Wo mujhe whatsapp pe share kijiyega sir.
Executive: Yahi number hai aapka?
Customer: Ha nahi nahi mai aapko hi likh ke bhejta hu number bataiye whatsapp number apna.
Executive: Whatsapp number 7248
Customer: 7248
Executive: 008
Customer: Zero
Executive: 008
Customer: 008
Executive: 237
Customer: 237
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ji maine hi likh ke bheja hai ek baar aap mujhe teen page ka PDF share kariye.
Executive: Wo registration number.
Customer: Ha registration number hota hai na teen page ka ek PDF hota hai GST ka aapka.
Executive: Hanji hanji mai bhejta hu do minute lag rahi hai bhejta hu.
Customer: Koi dikkat nahi mai line pe hu aap bhejiye.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Dusri us GST me update ho gayi hogi na manufacturer.
Executive: Hanji hanji.
Customer: To update ho gaya hai.
Executive: Ha to fir wo change ho jayega sir uske liye koi issue nahi hai mai yaha pe ticket open kar dunga uske hisab se change ho jayega waise aap mujhe apni company ke bare me thoda sa bataye ye Leo Motors jo hai abhi live hui hai India Mart pe.
Ye aap manufacturing karte hai sare product ka.
Executive: Hanji charger to dealing karte hai charger me lekin batteries vagera me manufacturer karte hai.
Customer: Thik hai aur ye kaha kaha aap log kam karte hai sir aise Dehradun se to company register hai hum log kam kaha kaha kis location me karte hai.
Executive: All over India.
Customer: All over India thik hai.
To sir services to aapki jo hai na wo live hui hai date 17 November se thik hai aur mere ko jo aapki company assign hui hai.
Ek 17 se kal se hui hai sir ye to.
Customer: Ha kal se ek minute 18 tarikh se hui hai live aapki 17 tak to hai 18 tarikh se aapki live hui hai.
Aur aaj hi aapki company mere pass assign kiya gaya hai to aapko service use karne ke liye aata hai kya kis tarike se kaise use karna hai.
Executive: Hanji hanji.
Customer: Aapki buylead vagera consume kare sir to uske liye na mujhe guide bhi karna padega aapko ki kis tarike se service kaise use karna hai to aap service phone se use karenge system se use karenge sir.
Executive: Service kis type ki service matlab.
Customer: Jaise India Mart pe aapne service liya hai thik hai business ke liye.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: To aapko bataya gaya hoga ki aapko lead aayenge buylead.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Us lead pe click karke consume karna hai uske baad aapko direct message aayenge uska follow up lena hai aapke pass samne se customer ka call aayega to wo teeno jo cheeze hai wo kis tarike se follow up karna hai kis tarike se kaha pe kaise dikhega wo mujhe guide karna hoga aapko.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: To aap jo services use karenge by phone se use karenge ya laptop se use karenge system se.
Executive: Dono dono cheez se kar lunga.
Customer: Thik hai to aap video meeting join kar sakte hai sir link agar mai bhej du aapko video meeting ka aap ek baar meeting join kar sakte hai guide karne ke liye.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: To abhi bhej du aap abhi join kar lenge.
Executive: Hanji kitni der ki rahegi.
Customer: Jyada nahi 10 se 12 minute lagega aapko proper guidance karne me kis tarike se kaise use karna hai aur aap usko start kar dijiyega to mai abhi link bhej raha hu aur aap mujhe share kar dijiyega wo PDF wo bhi mai yaha pe dal ke na isko change karwa dunga.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai link aapko mail pe mil gaya hoga sir register jo mail id hai us pe aapko link aa gaya hoga.
Executive: Thik hai sir mai check kar raha hu.
Customer: Thik okay aur join kijiyega usi mail pe aane ke baad ye jo Vishal Kumar wala mail id hai na sir.
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Usi pe gaya hai link.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Customer: Okay join karke aaiye meeting me.
Executive: Ji sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to change nature of business in GST.

- Executive needs guidance on using IndiaMART services.



Resolution:

- Customer asked executive to share GST PDF on WhatsApp.

- Customer offered a video meeting for guidance.

- Customer will change details after receiving PDF.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will join the meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- gst, services, buyleads, video meeting
